summary: Hillbilly family life in 1941 rural Georgia.
cast: Charley Grapewin|Marjorie Rambeau|Gene Tierney|William Tracy|Elizabeth Patterson|Dana Andrews|Slim Summerville|Ward Bond|Grant Mitchell|Zeffie Tilbury|Russell Simpson|Spencer Charters|Irving Bacon|Harry Tyler|Charles Halton|George Chandler|Charles Trowbridge|Charles Waldron|Dorothy Adams|Erville Alderson|Luke Cosgrave|Francis Ford|David Hughes|Mae Marsh|John 'Skins' Miller|Jack Pennick|Robert Shaw
title: La ruta del tabaco
